description.value:
Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Force

Standard

Reach 3

+26 vs AC; 3d6+8 damage plus 2d6 force damage, and the dragon slides the target 2 squares.

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 3

+26 vs AC; 3d6+8 damage.

At-Will

Standard

The dragon makes two claw attacks

At-Will

Immediate Reaction

Targets the triggering enemy

Trigger: When an enemy moves into an adjacent square, at-will

+24 vs Fortitude; 3d6+8 damage, and the target is knocked prone. Effect: The dragon shifts 1 square and flies 3 squares.

At-Will ✦ Charm

Minor 1/Round, At-Will

+23 vs Will; the dragon slides the target 2 squares, and the target grants combat advantage until the end of the dragon's next turn. Effect: The dragon shifts 1 square.

Recharge 5-6 ✦ Force

Standard

Close burst 10

Targets enemies; +25 vs Fortitude; 4d8+8 force damage, and the target is dazed (save ends). Miss: Half damage.

Encounter ✦ Force

Free

Trigger: When first bloodied, encounter

Breath weapon recharges, and the dragon uses it

Encounter ✦ Fear

Standard

Close burst 10

Targets enemies; +25 vs Will; the target is stunned until the end of the dragon's next turn. Aftereffect: The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends).

ForceZone

Standard, Recharges When The Dragon Uses Breath Weapon

Area burst 1 within 10

Trigger: When the dragon uses breath weapon

+25 vs Reflex; 3d10+8 force damage. Effect: The burst becomes a zone of force until the end of the dragon's next turn. A creature within the zone can't leave it.

system.rechargeCondition: When The Dragon Uses Breath Weapon

description.value:
At-Will ✦ Polymorph

Minor

The dragon can alter its physical form to appear as a unique human (see "Change Shape," MM2 216).
